lines.text: A musical card?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was up there with the moment Scanlan had the knife ready to go and then he kept going out the window.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that was so amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I pretty much did the same thing, too, when I accidentally killed the half-dead dwarf as Minxie by picking him up by the neck when we were in the Underdark.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: By his scruff?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I picked him up by the scruff and he had one hit point left. It was just enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, snap. Ooh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was where the "I try so hard and I'm the worst" came from.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm here to help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Keyleth's the worst. She's--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, she's the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The reactionary push into the lava's one of my favorites. She's like, "I don't know what to "do! I'm sorry!" Just pushing him down into the lava as he's like (screaming). "I'm sorry!" That was so funny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the flip side, one of our home moments was amazing-- it's actually on my vine account-- which was Keyleth walking up to a shambling mound? Was it a shambling mound?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a corrupt treant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A corrupt treant. We were going to have to fight that thing and you went (blugh) and it went (groaning) and wandered off and we were all like (yelling).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it was great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't remember what spell it was, but it was something that essentially you can charm a specific plant-based monster, and it failed its saving throw. It was going to be this epic encounter with this giant corrupted treant in the middle of the Bramble Forest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was Dominate Plants. During Pathfinder days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It was this big old bramble forest that led up to the actual home of the Dread Emperor and it walked out and was like (roars) and you're like, "Sit down and sleep." "Okay." And that was it and I was like, well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I like-- believing in the what I like to call the Community zodiac, as in Dan Harmon's Community, and Keyleth is definitely the Britta of the Community zodiac. She's Britta.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, yeah. I totally see that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What you got under that blanket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we'll find out here shortly. Let's do one more question and then we're going to take a break and come back here for the Battle Royale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make it a good one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! I'm trying to see. Let's go for the chat. We've done a lot of these. Chat, let's see what we got. This'll be our last question for the night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth is totally Britta. See?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unless that is a hedge maze, I am a dead man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's another thing. I think we need Community fanart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Community fanart? Crossover Community fanart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chat is going so fast. It's going so fast, oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If that's a big room, I'm gone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is not true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a quick throwaway. It won't be the last one. Someone asked if I could ever join Vox Machina, what class and race would I be? Dwarf bard. I think I've already specified that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A good final end question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone said, "What's worse, doors or dragons?" That's a pretty good question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. (laughs) We'll find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't read that stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, it's going so fast. It's okay. I'm glad you guys are so excited to ask questions, but I can't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, it's like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like looking into the abyss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this is about the time where I'm like, do I need glasses?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be three minutes of us staring at the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can see through time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody asked-- here's a big question. I didn't see it on there, but somebody asked which character dying would have the biggest overall effect on the group?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't want to answer that, because then it's going to subconsciously make me feel really awful if they die. I don't want to answer that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never mind. Bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't want that to happen. Interesting idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have someone in your head, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I don't. I don't want that in my head. I don't want any of that in my head. If it happens, it happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forget it. What are the dimensions of the cube?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dimensions of the cube? (laughs) Sam's cube?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's one by one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Forget it. Just how do we kill the dragon, and then we'll stop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Someone asked if Umbrasyl was suicidally depressed yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's the Hodor of the group? Oh. We're not going to talk about that. Also, spoilers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spoilers! God, some of us haven't had time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have you watched it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't even started this season yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hodor has an amazing moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've heard. The internet told me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hush. It's awesome. Have you ever regretted a decision you made, either in character or while DMing? We'll have this as our final question for the evening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Regretted a decision in character or while DMing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got mine ready to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Using my Cape of the Mountebank for the first time to teleport to the other side of the glass and save everybody! (clunk) Oh fuck. It was like, my stomach just went--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was going to be their turn, leave, and hit the button as they left circumstance, and you went right there and hit it. I'm like, well, that saves them the problem of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thought it was the door opener. Nope. That's all right. It was a great moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a great moment, but didn't quite work how you thought.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoops! Still alive for one more week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How about you guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really, junior-high-level foolishness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Anything with you guys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So many.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Man, there's so many. There's so many little ones where I'm like (groans).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. All the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Death by a thousand cuts?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh no. Fuck you, Kilgrave. Well, I get angry at Keyleth sometimes for not being more assertive. And then there's some times that I want to say things as Marisha for Keyleth, but I'm like, no, she wouldn't. She would be bowled over right now and she would go with it. So there's several times where I'm like, (inhale) fuck! Why couldn't you speak up? And then there's some times where the game moves faster than we can keep up with it, and sometimes you're like, I want this to happen. God, there have been three separate times where I've wanted to come knock on your door and it (snaps) the game rolls past it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like, you're like, I'm going to, oh no, they're having a moment. And then you kind of forget it, or the moment passes and you got to let it go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, theater etiquette. I remember, and the audience noticed it, and they were like, if they don't come back to this moment-- I came over, and I sat down and I said-- we were in a tavern, and I said Keyleth puts her head on Vax. She leans her head on Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, and what I was thinking was, Gilmore's over there, and he's looking at this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then Gilmore walked in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's looking at this and I can't explain this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it was literally like a fucking bar scenario. I was like, "Oh, there's Gilmore. Got to go." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That whole bar episode was great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love that bar episode so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I want to yell at Percy all the time. He does dumb shit a lot and I'm like, I got to let it happen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax and Keyleth really like each other, but this is them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can't sync up. Cannot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ross and Rachel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you just say that? Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So much Ross and Rachel. Oh my god. So Ross and Rachel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For instance, when Gilmore came in and gave you guys the Heroes' Feast, not thinking at the time, it set you up for a battle with a purple worm and essentially disabled its most dangerous element: its tail poison. I didn't realize it at the time because it just organically happened. But I'm not going to try and hold that back or restrain it in the moment. It happened to work out to be in your favor, and that's how it works sometimes. I just let it happen. So I wouldn't say I really have any regrets. Not because I'm too good for them, just because I let things happen, and I appreciate it for the good and the bad that comes with it and let the story guide itself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We entertain ourselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hope so. (laughs) The moment that stops, we need to stop doing this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and to Greg who says Keyleth probably regrets not reading her spells, and I'm going to join Ashley and speak for you, even though you're not asking for it. We have a lot of fucking spells, man!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So many spells! It's so hard to keep track in the moment when you're stressed!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're so stressed!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you'll turn to me and be like, am I reading this right? And I'll go, oh yeah. And then a thing will happen like whoa!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's happened so many times where you're like, and I'll show it to Laura or Travis and be like, is this right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, no, this is going to be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a ton of things like Mist Form that I didn't know how it was going to act in the moment and it didn't mean I didn't read it. I read all of my spells hundreds of times. I have hundreds. I have hundreds, and I've read all of them and I will try them in the moment and sometimes they'll work in my favor and sometimes they won't. I don't always know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is fine. A big part of D&D is fucking up. That's just how it is. In any good game there's going to be fuck-ups. We just roll with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not appellate law.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --for the purposes of this fight, everyone's been leveled up to a baseline level 14, so everyone's at an even scope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because I'm behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm behind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So let's go ahead and take a break. We'll be back here in a few minutes and we'll see which member of Vox Machina in this battle will stand supreme.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The answer is "not me." [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everybody. We're about to jump here in the Battle Royale. We wanted to let you guys know as part of our final week of the Loot Crate sponsorship. Their June theme is dystopia.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's dystopia, which is cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That sounds awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to feature RoboCop, Terminator 3, Matrix. It involves Fallout 4 and Bioshock Infinite stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did you say Matrix?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't heard that in a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the world that created the Matrix film is a desolate, sad place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was really happy when they printed the Pip-Boy statue. Marisha's going to get her dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are these mine? Yeah--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All right, so welcome back as we kick into-- (dramatic music)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I have decided for fun, I wanted to see which one of you guys could fight. I did this "thing once with a bunch of heroes and it got crazy, so I am scaling it down. You four, let's "see who beats the crap out of the others, shall we?" He snaps his fingers and with that, it flashes to black and the air around you gets hotter and hotter. You feel yourself sweating in darkness and suddenly, your vision comes to you and you see before you a landscape of molten rock and lava.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that actually your Beyonder voice if it ever happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: This is ridiculous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm using a luck right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Already? So soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll initiative, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Ashley?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so a total of seven. We have 25-20? 20-15?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, to see which of you goes first, I am going to have you guys both roll off again for initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 again, both of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans) Natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Vax is going slightly before Keyleth, then Percy, then we have Pike. All righty, so first round is Vax's. Vax, what are you going to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy crap. Okay, with the assassin feature, I have advantage now because I'm going first. I'm going to throw a dagger right at Percy's head. Am I within 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yes. (counting)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Right out of the motherfucking gate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have my sword or do you not have my sword right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, he is within 50 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is our basic stuff. Even if I had it, I'm not using that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is basic weapons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh good, that's a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your AC, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My AC is 18, but I'm going to try and use the gloves of missile snaring. That brings it to a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The damage of it, at least. Let him roll damage first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, roll damage. That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting) 39, and this is the dagger of venom, and I want him to roll versus poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 39 damage, and you want to do your gloves of missile snaring?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do my 39 damage right now. I didn't roll the right die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Set it aside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 13 points off that, so that's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How does that work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He basically grabs your dagger out of the air and stops some of the damage before it strikes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Automatically, or does he have to succeed to do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it just lowers the damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 13 points off that, so that's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 damage you take, piercing damage. And I need you to go ahead and make-- is it a constitution saving throw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, 15 is the DC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving throw. That's a d20, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It succeeds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, quick question, Matt. If I were to attack him three times in a row, right? The next two get no sneak attack, I know that. If I move to another target, do they get sneak attack or no in this instance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you only get to sneak attack once per round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One time per round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, and remember, you have not activated your boots yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I click them now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the item real fast, too. Is there an activation cost for the boots?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boots of haste, Laura has that piece of paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh right. We will say for the purposes, it would be a bonus action to activate it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the lighting like in here? There's the light from--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This whole room is low light. It is just the glow from the lava in here. Since a number of you have darkvision, it's not a huge deal within 60 feet, but it is considered technically low light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're saying the boots-- I don't think I have ever used a bonus action before when clicking the boots, so we need to change things from here on out. You've never called me on it in 50 games.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, usually it was the first round that you did it, but it's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, then with your permission, I am going to use my-- I am going to throw another dagger. I totally miss and I am going to let it go. It was a one. I am going to step past that wall there, I can do it myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can! You can reach out and actually change things as you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As soon as I'm there-- (whispering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN, ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Secrets!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second luck down already. Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I need Keyleth and Percy to roll perception checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know he is somewhere in this area, but that's all you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the end of your turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, so bonus action is different than a free action, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. As my action, I am going to cast Sunbeam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I guess since Percy's the one in my line of sight, I am going to be beaming it right at Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I in line of sight? Yes, I am in line of sight, aren't I? Do I have partial cover from that? No, I don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're firing it this way? So, what is the-- Sunbeam! All right, Percy, I need you to go ahead, because it is within a 60-foot line, a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving throw. That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he saves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking balls!

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: You take half damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Keyleth, you go and you reach your hand out, and suddenly the room blasts into bright light as a beam of pure solar energy streaks into Percy's face. Percy, you manage to close your eyes and bend out of the way just in time, still taking some of the impact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (counting) 38 halved.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 19 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 19 points of radiant damage. You are not blinded because you made your save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is true. As a bonus action, I'm going to cast Grasping Vine-- sorry, Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasping Vine, unfortunately, is a 4th-level spell. You have already cast a 6th-level spell. It has to be 2nd or lower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is true. Never mind then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it going to fit any more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Barely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy cow. How high is the ceiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) The ceiling actually is about 30 feet up. It's a domed cavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So watch your head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are set into this pocket of very hot earth with no foreseeable exit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I am going to sink into the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth sinks beneath the ground. As you do, you suddenly feel yourself plummeting into a pocket of molten rock which is beneath this entire area here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I come up really fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, but you still go ahead and take damage from this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And we are dealing with molten lava?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is happening fast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will say here, for the purposes of this, everyone gets a nice view of the top of my head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bonus camera.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We don't know where Vax is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do not know where Vax is. We know that he is back there somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 points of fire damage from suddenly submerging yourself partially into molten rock and as your rock form does help resist it somewhat, it still begins to severely damage your earth elemental form and you immediately pop back up into the space you were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In that case--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that case?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm happy where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Keyleth ends her turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's figure out what we are doing with this. First of all, I'm going to-- You got away, you little son of a bitch. You're hiding back there, aren't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see this giant earth elemental submerge and then come back out of the earth with elements of superheated rock around the edges of its surface. Pike is off to the side, looking about, trying to decide what she's going to do, but you have the jump on her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First off, I'm going to cast Hex on Keyleth for the moment, because I've got to get that thing off the board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, Keyleth by the way, because you took fire damage, I need you to make a concentration check to maintain your Sunbeam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I have to roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half the damage for-- how much did you take from that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I took 35 damage-- yeah, I am good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 plus your constitution-- yeah, you're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to make you have disadvantage on strength checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength checks are at disadvantage while you're hexed. What else you got, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hit her with the Retort pistol--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You whip out Retort.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First shot is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your AC for your earth elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's amazing how careful PVP is making us all be.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seriously.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 15 points of piercing damage plus four necro damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, piercing is halved for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not magical, correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's seven damage plus four necrotic, so a total of 11 points of damage. The blasts are hitting the hide of the earth elemental, not quite impacting as strongly as you thought.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to take one more shot then and I'm going to spend a grit for a headshot to give her disadvantage on attacks until the end of her next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a concentration check by the way from the first hit, so you have to roll an 11 or higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your AC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, no. This one actually does manage to hit the shoulder, but it ricochets off and blasts the volcanic rock near her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it. And just for fun, I'm going to take a third shot to see if I can do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Third shot against the earth elemental Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does hit. That's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit. Go ahead and roll damage on this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that was not a grit shot. So that's... that's nice. 15, halved again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus six necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so 13 points of damage total. I need you to make another concentration check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh. Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your constitution modifier?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As an earth elemental? Plus five. So eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, Sunbeam drops. The impact manages to actually knock the spell out of your peripheral.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And also, make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. So yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 19 is the DC, so does she make it?

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she makes it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it! Ugh, should've done better. And then I'm going to dive back here. For now I'm going to try and get some cover. Yeah, dive back there for some cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends Percy's turn. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So we're going to start-- I'm going to cast Guardian of Faith and I would like to place it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where would you want to place Guardian of Faith?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's ten feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see the spell here real fast to make sure I've got this right. So, Guardian of Faith... there we go. It's within 30 feet of you. Any hostile creature to you that moves to a space within ten feet of the guardian has to succeed-- so where are you putting it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to place it right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. And then I am going to cast, for my bonus action, Shield of Faith on myself, which brings my armor class up by two points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guardian of Faith is 4th-level. What level is that one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shield of Faith is first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: perfect. It's coming. So you have a plus two bonus to AC for the duration. It's concentration. Good for you. Are you going to move or stay right there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to just kind of-- well, he's there. I'm going to stay. I'll stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Pike's turn. Top of the round. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm from a hidden position, right? Advantage. Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, they didn't see you. And from what you're aware, nothing has seen you yet, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. And as soon as I go, I'm giving away my position to everybody or to the person that I'm attacking, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, everybody who could see where you are, so you'd be giving it away to whoever that individual is. Do you have your mini, by the way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was wondering where it went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should I just place him as soon as I attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I throw a dagger at Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm partially covered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't matter. I'm a sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he avoids cover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's a 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so here we go. That's two, plus (counting) 24 plus six is 30.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that halved? Is that magic or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His weapons are magic, so does not halve.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 30?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of magical slashing damage against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I will use my bonus action to hide. Can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, right now, are completely visible to her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I attempt to now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, Percy does have sight to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I attempt to stealth from both of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, you're only obscured from one of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought it was low light everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hide. Chapter seven for hiding! All right, let's go to chapter seven, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Meanwhile, in chapter seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, it's great, isn't it? Isn't it wonderful?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Chapter seven is actually hiding in chapter four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just want to make sure we're doing this properly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really hiding from itself. Aren't we all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not helping me by telling me it's there! This is ridiculous. I'm pretty sure you have to be entirely obscured; it's not so much having dim light. I might be wrong, but I don't want them to tell me--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hiding is poorly explained in the Player's Handbook, honestly. Yeah. It's great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got it, never mind. Hold on. Instead. Oh. I have a backup idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hiding. There it is. You can't hide from a creature that can see you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can he see in dim light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has disadvantage to perception checks because it's dim light. He does not have darkvision.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's her line of sight? She can see here, obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can see there. She would not be able to see you in this area here behind that wall. That's how it would work. Okay, I feel better about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I think. That's what I'm going to try to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you trying to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going stealth. That's great. That is a 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32. You move past here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm using my bonus action to dash. I'm going to real quiet, tippy-toe in dim light. I'm a 32, still stealthing tippy-toe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Percy to make a perception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about me? No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've just passed the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He vanishes from sight from both of you guys. Where do you want to go? Okay. cool. That ends Vax's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's my turn again already?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's only four of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it was half the damage you took. I'm trying to remember. You actually would still have Sunbeam still up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was also full necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was, but even then it's half the damage or a ten or higher. I was thinking of full damage at the time. It's half the damage or ten, whichever's higher. So you would still have Sunbeam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That changes everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. I just realized that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out of sight now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She still saw where you walked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, that changed my whole plan. Sorry, Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that mean there's that much light in the cavern that I'm not at disadvantage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whenever I blast. I'm going to flip around here. Fling! Sunbeam blast Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Need you to roll constitution, I believe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Constitution!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a constitution check, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right! What's the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My apologies. You guys are helpful sometimes. I really need to ignore chat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I lost Sunbeam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did lose Sunbeam, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I rolled higher than half?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half or ten, whichever is higher, is how concentration works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I always have to beat a ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Always have to beat a ten no matter what.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're sure it's not the other way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure it's not the other way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That changes things again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's why I don't have chat on during the game. I start second-guessing myself and I realize it's okay. You guys are kind of helpful sometimes, it's fine!

lines.name: TALIESIN, ASHLEY
lines.text: Guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are hexed, you do not have Sunbeam, but you are still full earth elemental form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. This is a lava pool right here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a portion of the wall in which there is molten rock pooling out of the side, yes. You get the feeling this whole room has pockets of it that are based around molten rock. You can see which ones seem to be closer than others.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck it. I'm going to come here because I do double damage to rock things. I'm going to smash this open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to smash that open?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to smash that wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Break it down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your fist slams into the wall. Roll double damage because you're siege and this is technically part of a structure. Roll damage on your slam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. It's plus eight to hit, so it was actually more. 2d8 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d8 plus five and then double.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I double the dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double the whole thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I roll two more? Oh, I double the whole thing. Ten plus five. 30 damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of damage to the rock wall with one fist. Your knuckles take out a portion of the wall and molten rock begins to spill into the alley here. This whole area right now is spilling molten rock and is now considered an area of lava that is slowly expanding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With that, I am going to back up, move, and tuck here behind this wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have enough movement, I think, to do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my earthglide as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your earthglide? Yeah. Instead of going around it, you just boof through the wall. That's fine. That ends your turn. Percy, you're up. You see the glow of fresh molten rock beginning to spill from around the wall side, though you're not sure what the source is. Pike, the heat's causing you to sweat within your armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm coming in around here. I'm going to take some shots at Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on! (singing) Shot through the heart!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) And you're to blame!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you step into that spot--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I not ten feet away from it? Oh, I wouldn't even know, would I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wouldn't know! You have no idea. As soon as you step into that spot, what's the saving throw on the guardian?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the DC. Guardian of Faith. I need you to roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 15, but I don't like that, I'm going to reroll it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your feat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. That's a natural 20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take half damage. You take ten points of radiant damage. Mark a 50 for you so keep track of the damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I took ten points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I back up away from it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the rest of your turn, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Fuck that guy. First thing, I'm going to use my bonus action to run a quick heal. That sucked so bad. That's 13 points back. (counting) That was just awful. That just makes me sad. That couldn't have gone worse. That's burned all that. I'm going to take a shot at Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Bring it on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And my gun seizes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Flipping that out for Bad News.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Retort goes back in the holster as you see Percy around the corner, pull out from his back, unfolds and locks into place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have room for one shot before my turn is over. Here we go, my one shot. Let's not do that again, that was really inappropriate. Better! 32 to hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughing) Yeah, that hits. That'll do, pig, that'll do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points of piercing damage against Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm known as a scavenger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really annoyed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughing) It's all I got. I ain't got any hexes or bullets or bits of spells or help from the gods.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Oof.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, the minute I have sights on you, you're dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll never have sights on me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know I'll never have sights on you. I may have to burn a turn fixing a gun, too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, well, I got to heal myself because I have such low hit points. I have a different plan now since that happened. Where did it go? Okay, I'm going to do Cure Wounds on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With a 3rd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cure Wounds at what level?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3rd-level? What else are you doing in your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What else am I going to do? I'm going to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you're mindful, 3rd-level means you can't cast another spell that's not above 2nd-level. Just so you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I'm just going to do that and then move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tensions are so high, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not with Liam, Liam is just like, whatever. It's like, "You don't know. You don't "know me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could still easily die. As soon as I go for it, pops his head up, he's getting shot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to move over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over there? All right. So you scoot over into this mid-area as the gnome cleric hides between the two boundaries of this rock formation, this small hallway. There you are, and you hear the burbling of slow-moving molten rock behind you. All right, that ends Pike's turn, we're back up to the top. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh, okay. Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you move?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, no. Well, it's fine, it's where I was, but I was going to just use-- and I'm here and then I throw a dagger. That's the flame-tongue--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's being so secretive. This is pressure. I'm feeling some pressure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits. That's a 25. And here we go again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another ranged sneak attack against the earth elemental?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm, okay. (counting) It's not that good, another 30 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 30 points of piercing damage against your earth elemental form, the dagger striking part of your armored self and causing the stone to shatter and break in a section. How you at health-wise, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still an earth elemental.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I take one step this way, which I think takes me out of her line of sight? Or do I need to go one more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to keep going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How about here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wherever you think you need to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'm here and I'm going to use a bonus action and an action and use another action to go stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of your Haste? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good, real good. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percy, I need you to roll another perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Isn't he covered by this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can still see past that. There's a base-to-base visible. You do not have disadvantage, though, because Sunbeam actually does give bright light in the room for a vicinity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What'd you get?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is it, perception? That's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. You have no idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Literally, I rolled a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have to roll a natural 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would probably have to roll a natural 20 to actually see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do. All right, you're there. That brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. This keeps happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do drop Sunbeam. God, I'm so confused now. I'm so confused. You guys have confused me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have not cast Sunbeam since you told me I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I know. So you still had disadvantage, but you would have missed anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 17, there's nothing I could have done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ugh, I'm going to just cover the chat now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can face it away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's good that tonight is your derp night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah. No worries, it's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do something similar and I'm going to move and I'm going to go bam and slam into that one. Come over here, reach, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll your attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine. It's enough to hit the rock. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. 18 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 damage? Doubled? Okay. So 18 points of damage. Your fist slams through the piece of rock there. It does open up some of the area and some of the lava begins to spill out, but it's just a slow trickle, it's not a large deluge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do my second attack, then. Bam. That's much better. That's a 16 plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage. All right, chat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Also much better damage. So that's 13 plus five, 18, so that is 36.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one has actually expanded outward to cover that area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And then I move back and I hide again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your full move on the earth elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just walking, 30. If I'm earthgliding, 60.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you then subterranean gliding through, based on what you did before? Because if not, your full movement's going to take you to there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well then I'll stay there, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Just so you know. All right, so you're right there. Cool. Ends Keyleth's turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm peeking around. I see the giant earth creature, and I'm taking a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. Here we go. Actually, I'm going to make it a-- no, I'm just going to take the shot. I have to reload Bad News anyway, so this is the reload shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first shot is reload, second attack is a shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank god. Nope, never mind, oh my god, for the love of god and all that is holy. Gun broke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have any Lucky left? Don't forget you have your luck points still. Your feat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, did he take that feat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did for his level 14 feat for tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For tonight. I will never actually take it, but for tonight.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't double Lucky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't know that. Well, it doesn't matter, because the second luck was also a gun break, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bad News is also broken.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn an action surge to fix the gun.

lines.name: MATT

I'm going to go ahead and mark that as an open part of the wall. You can still move, or do you want to stay there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dexterity? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is not going to work. You take 20 points of radiant damage as a guardian in this vicinity all of a sudden--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I use evasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take half damage. You take ten points of radiant damage as you rush by. All of a sudden, an unseen guardian of energy comes forming out of the wall and slams into you as you pass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pass what? What do I pass? I didn't even move yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you did. This technically would have happened last turn. Yeah, because I forgot it last turn. So it's another ten damage. Mark that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that drop stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that the only damage you've taken this game?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, and Vax reappears right here, on the move, and I am throwing a dagger right at Percy's forehead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 24? All right. Percy, what's your AC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My AC is 18, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's a hit. A dagger comes out of nowhere as you look over just in time to see it coming at you, you're going to go ahead and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to do a catch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and attempt to Missile Snare. Well no, it's a reaction to do it, isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already used your reaction to do that attack of opportunity against Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, does that burn my reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So, yeah, you don't have the reaction to do it, unfortunately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 36 points of piercing damage against you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently-- Pinned you to the wall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say as you fall back the blade takes you and pins you against the wall. You are (dying sound) eyes roll back closed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a lot of ones and twos this fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You rolled a fuckton, and twos and threes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, what I'd like to do, because I didn't even stop moving, is use my bonus action to kinda dive this way and hide here, right on top of Percival's body.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we allowed to loot the body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm going to roll for stealth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being the person who died first last time, I know it sucks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was prepared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At least it wasn't a Finger of Death like five minutes in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pike, I need you to go ahead and roll a perception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 12. Or wait, hold on. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, okay, yeah, you see a flash as Vax runs past you and then disappears around the corner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and I'm going to run to-- hold on, I'll tell you where I'm going to run to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So, with that, it is Keyleth's turn. You sensed Vax run this way and then vanish from your current visual range of tremor sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I want to very carefully step forward here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, go ahead and make another dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, yeah, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you manage to just scoot past him again without falling over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I sense Vax again, or anybody else for that matter?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have sensed Vax actually moving last round even then, because you didn't move that far. You do know where he is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done, no, you took, yeah. You did some intense damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw, sorry, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay. That was awesome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) Sucks. I don't know if I like this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're my friends!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "You're my friends!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember all that time out on the ocean, worrying about Percy, was he okay? How is his soul?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I only feel that that's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to drop my earth elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can see through this wall still. I mean, you still remember where he was, but your tremor sense is no longer there, so you have to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of guess. Well, guessing, I want to do a Flaming Sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flaming Sphere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doing it 4th-level, why not? Wait, I need to-- I'm trying to keep track of two different sets here, from my real game and from this fake game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, where is Flaming Sphere going to go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I should probably kill me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, sorry, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still not dead yet, you're unconscious. If you manage to-- which happened in our last battle royale-- roll a natural 20 on a death saving throw, you come back to consciousness. So Flaming Sphere at 4th level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That means you'll be doing 4d6 fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 60-foot range, 4d6?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you putting it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to go (explosion) in this corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, right there, or right on there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a five-foot diameter sphere, that's how big it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's only a five-foot diameter? I'm guessing there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bright light shines in the area, and from your visual perspective, you show up because of where you are. Where's your figure?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, there he is. I was sitting on Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Flaming Sphere appears. So that's your action, and as a bonus action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet if you wanted to, to ram it into something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, I'll ram it into Vax now that I can see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sphere starts slamming into you. Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get advantage because of the boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. Unfortunately, he dodges out of the sphere as it slams into the wall. Percy, you take a death saving throw automatically as the Flaming Sphere rolls over your current unconscious body, pinned against the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I lose a death saving throw? I'm one down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do. You're one down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks for dropping earth elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. And I'm going to tuck behind this wall and see if I can hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can't hide, you used your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll tuck behind the wall at least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your turn, Keyleth. Percy, roll another death saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) What about the marbles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's already made her roll this turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Under over ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten or higher is what you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a second death saving throw. You're down two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was like, "I rolled another three."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you're up. You see this burst of flame and around the corner, you see a very visible Vax, just out of the corner of your eye, dodge the fire.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, hi Vax. Oh boy, now I can see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is the one time you will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (hissing)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit, okay. That changes what I was going to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Gollum voice) Nasty cleric.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am going to cast Flame Strike at him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All the fire!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All the fire, all the rage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, with Flame Strike, suddenly, fire and divine light come bursting up in a column around you up to the ceiling in a horrible spray of flame. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage. Not good. Really bad, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That's 8d6 fire damage and 8d6 radiant-- sorry, 4d6 fire, 4d6 radiant. So yeah, 8d6 points of damage. And Percy incinerates, his body is turned to ash.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I say what the armor was? What did I set my armor to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You set it to necrotic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Aw, balls. That could've been so accidentally good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but you said necrotic. So you take half damage of whatever this is. (chuckles) Hashtag no mercy for Percy! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the halved version of that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, that's the full. Yeah, I had some bad rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take ten points of damage. You can still move if you want, you have not moved yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I just used a 5th-level to deal ten points of damage. And I'm going to do Healing Word on myself at 2nd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2nd-level? So 2d4 plus five. Nice! So 12 points of healing to you. And you want to move as well?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to stand directly behind the pole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? There?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit, but then she can see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I stay where I was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you were? Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She lost line of sight of me? Am I in this little nook still on Percy's ashes? Looks like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike's hiding out, there's still a little bit of line of sight on you, just on the edge based on the square you are on. That's where his corpse was on right now, and there's a big flaming sphere that's also lighting up the area. There's no real darkness there. Obscuring yourself is the only way that would aid you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now it gets interesting. I'm going to take one step this way. Is this still burning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's chilling there, burning on this side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to throw a regular, non-sneak-attack dagger at Pike. Terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull back, you see Vax pop around the corner, throw a dagger, and it streaks off your shield and you knock it out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is broken, right, this is gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can see through this part of the wall right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this wall here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That wall is still there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so what I want to do is use my movement to tuck in here, press into the wall, go stealth. That's good, that is 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a perception check, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 19. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea where Vax is. Vax has essentially vanished from view.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What in the heck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll tell you where I'm going. I'm going to run to here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth incinerates the entire cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing that turn, comes to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck. I have no idea where Vax is, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. You hid to keep out of the view of everything. To be fair, currently Vax has no idea where you are either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. If I peek around this wall, can I see Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you peek around right now, you can go and look, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you peek around the corner, Pike is currently not visible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So no one's visible? Whatsoever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I ask a quick question? When I put those marbles down, it went (marbles rolling), right? A non-rogue leaping over this, we'd all hear that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A non-rogue leaping over there? Probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unless they tried to make a stealth move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you make noise when you run anyway, regardless. Only a stealthy character who's already hidden that it would be a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have my Sphere up. I don't know where anyone is. Fucking fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you got, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what I would do aside from something defensive at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have any spells that cover an area that are helpful? Like Faerie Fire, anything like that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't take Faerie Fire today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rough call against a rogue, that would have been clutch. But now you know for the future. Just letting you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tremor sense was good, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was very good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me go ahead-- I do have Sleet Storm that I learned. I think it's just an instant, let me see really quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleet Storm's an action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20-foot-tall cylinder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a 40-foot radius centered at a point you choose within range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 40-foot radius, 20-foot tall, 150-foot range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Where do you want to place it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last I saw Vax was over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw him in this area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Centered from where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Centering it from there will only get this section. If you center it further out, you'll hit more of an area, just so you know from a tactical standpoint.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of want to get Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 40-foot radius, it's going to hit everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well then, sure, let's do-- what's this? (counting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Know that the radius is very big on this, so before you put it too close to a wall, you can have more space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do here-ish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flaming Sphere drops. All right, so the center is where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (counting) Yeah, it's right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly, out of nowhere, a burst of freezing rain and sleet starts spilling out of the sky, conjured from this temporal portal that pulls from some distant elemental dimension. As it hits the ground, a lot of the lava begins to cool and darken in certain areas. This area begins to cool a little bit. Not entirely, but it's beginning to fight against the cold temperature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything in that area has to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the start of its turn, yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or make a spell save DC or lose your concentration as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. Is that your action? And do you move anywhere, or do you stay where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I tuck back against the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you tuck back against the wall. There you are. So, that brings us to-- no longer Percy, Percy is gone. Sorry buddy, crossing you off there. Pike, your turn begins. This sleet and rain is hitting you from all over the place. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy was the fan favorite all day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it? Well, my money was on either you or me dying first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a huge deal. However, any spells you are concentrating in, you have to make a successful constitution saving throw. So make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, that's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lose your armor spell again, so you're back down to an AC of 20. Pike, now's your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you have ten more feet to move, so two more squares if you wanted to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am not going to move. I am going to create a Magic Circle around myself. And I am going to...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will take you ten rounds to cast.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Never mind. Oh, it

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry, girl.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, that's why I made a last-minute decision. Okay, you know what? I'm just going to stay there and I'm going to cast Spirit Guardians.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spirit Guardians?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, around myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At what level?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is the basic level.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of a sudden, there is another entity that has swirled around you. This spectral image of Sarenrae is now looming over Pike's form, just waiting. Ending Pike's turn, now up to Vax.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't do anything else, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your bonus still, if you wanted to do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do Shield of Faith again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. I'll do a Healing Word again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, buddy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to pop back into existence right here. And throw a dagger--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's tucked against the wall much like how you were tucked against the wall there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wouldn't have revealed myself if I had known that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know she's around there, but you'd probably have to traverse--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought she was five feet that way, which would have changed everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She'd be further spaced out from there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's everything that I've been working on for the last few minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Instead of that, because this is gone, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I see her from here? All right, I'm going to materialize--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, at the start of your turn, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw because of the sleet around you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. I have advantage, 11 or 11. What is with me? 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. What's the DC on your spell, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it versus my spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it is. 19, yeah, so you save. You're fine. No damage, no prone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Through the ice, through the snow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This wall's open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have sharpshooter, so does--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so she would have no cover on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, is that your AC? With that, sneak attack damage against Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, the pain begins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting) 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 points of piercing damage against you, Keyleth. As the dagger hits you in the back of the shoulder, you feel a sharp pain. It's weird being on the opposing end of Vax's daggers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to dance back, use bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, I need you to roll a perception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pfft, no. Not at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then my last action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And with that, I need Vax to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You manage to pull through the vicinity without any impact. Ending Vax's turn, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have the Sleet Storm up, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Although you do need to roll a concentration for the attack against you, which was thirty-what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30, right? Ooh, natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 would be more than half, you're fine. And you maintain concentration. Half of that would have been 16 or 17.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just keep it up. Pike still hasn't really moved, right? She's still in her same position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't see her. You haven't seen her for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I want to peer around this corner and see if I can spot Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, also, Vax, once again, I need you to make a wisdom saving throw as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. (chuckles) You take 3d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a wisdom-based thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so go ahead and roll 3d8. As the spirit guardian that's been looming over and can see over the wall and that whole vicinity-- as you run past, both of those spells blast at you. One of them you manage to dodge, but the Sarenrae guardian reaches out and slams a giant light blade down into you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I theoretically see that happening through this wall crack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you're currently hiding behind the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a blade?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a blast of energy, but from a styling standpoint, it's a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So no Uncanny Dodge for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can Uncanny Dodge-- no, this is not a spell attack against you, it just happens. So, no, Uncanny Dodge would not help you on this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's not a dexterity save, so full hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 12. Is it also the Guardian of Faith, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 12 points of radiant damage. At the end of your turn, now it's Keyleth, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
