lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bonus action, we'll say. 27? What did you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 27 to see where the fuck you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception? I rolled-- well, here's the thing. Let me tell you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I imagine a little chessboard--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you looking through this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm looking through this wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I prepare a Blight spell, and I hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Until I see either Pike or Vax appear in my view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. All right, that brings us to Pike's turn. Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to hold my turn until someone attacks me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nobody move!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't hold your whole turn. You have an action prepared. What do you want to do with your action?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If someone attacks me, then I'm going to attack back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to hold your attack action until somebody attacks you? Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come out of hiding, motherfucker!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come out, come out, wherever you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Vax's turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whistles as if for a dog)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It is now Keyleth's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you just fucking hiding, motherfucker? Are you just waiting this out? Are you camping right now? Are you being a fucking camper?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is in-tents.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I'm kidding. This is turning into a bad Counterstrike match real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do another scan to see if I can find the motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking out where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me see. What do I have in my bag? Papa's got a brand new bag. I am going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on deck, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have a Blight spell prepared, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't cast it. It never happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I put it away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You didn't actually cast it. You were ready that if it happened, you would do it immediately. You could do the same thing, if you wanted to, though it seems like everyone is doing nothing right now, so if this continues, I'm going to have to shake things up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crawl over. This is still lava flow, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still hot in there, but there's a shell of rock over it. You're not sure how strong it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, here's what I want to do, then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, how does the sleet spell work? You may have walked into your own spell radius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be-- never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you don't want to do that, you can back up, but otherwise, you'd be walking right into your sleet spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't realize it would stretch that far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a 40-foot radius, so it's out to here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to-- sorry, there's a lot going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to figure it out! I don't have a whole lot! I'm going to cast a Tidal Wave. I'm going to leave my sleet spell up, I guess. I will cast a Tidal Wave, which is in this thing, ten feet wide, ten feet tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30-foot long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup. So you have a ten-foot-wide column you can put anywhere for 30 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anywhere in a 20-foot radius, so I can see here, correct? I want to do it going this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Starting from where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, where I can see, and going this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn-- Make a dexterity check. Or a dexterity saving throw, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tidal Wave. It's what she used to destroy the elementals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's instantaneous so my thing is still up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 4d6 bludgeoning damage and you are knocked prone here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 4d8, so that's eight, 16, 17. Wait, 4d8? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of bludgeoning damage, and you are knocked prone as the wave crashes over you, dissipating into the stonework around, leaving little puddles that begin to steam and boil upon the impact across the ground, even as the sleet storm is crashing all around you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You're up, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to tuck back up against my wall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, at the top of your turn, you need to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sleet Storm is still up! Sleet Storm! Sleet Storm!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you maintain your armor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I just get up and then go to the middle part of the walls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move there. That's about as far as you can get with only half your movement left, so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I just start swinging and see if I can hit him, if he's in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to. Just make an attack up here? Okay. Roll an attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, he's not in there, but, I mean, 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. Whoosh, through the air. Nothing there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 28 is such a great roll, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Is that all you're going to do on your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) Yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm telling you what I'm doing right now. It's interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will drop stealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Show your face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forget that. Just this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what I'm talking about, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you holding what you were holding before? Okay. Okay. Got it. All right, cool. That ends Vax's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You dickhead. You dick. Okay. I'm going to pop around the corner again. Do I see Pike at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispering) Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wow. Ah, it's 11:00, it's amazing. This game is so depressing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did not know it was-- I was like, "Oh, yeah, it'll probably be pretty quick."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just broke the fucking pen. I just did a Travis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, what are you doing, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do another-- It sucks when you can't see people. It really fucking sucks. I am going to Call Lightning, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You will lose Sleet Storm. You good with that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quietly) No, not really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleet Storm has been somewhat effectual with Pike, but she's not moving much. Doesn't seem to affect, so it's up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Okay, I'll drop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the crackling and rolling thunder as little flashes of electrical energy begin to appear across the ceiling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to bring it down here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There? Okay. With that, (thunder). A blast of lightning hits the floor, smashes into the ground, rocks get thrown. No apparent effect. All right. You going to go back in your corner? All right. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Death Ward on myself. My last fourth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to wait-- What else are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so. Ugh, so frustrating because I can't see him. Can I make a Spiritual Weapon to see stealthy people? Like stealth goggles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a Spiritual Weapon that can move around and be a danger, but can't really make it to help you see stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, I was just trying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, yeah. I'm going to put a Spiritual Weapon, just hovering, that sweet sword of Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What level?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll go with this yellow one. Where do you want it to go?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just right above me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right above you? All right, so that'll be right there. Okay, that end your turn? All right, suddenly--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Aw, dang it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The entirety of the room begins to quake and shift. You hear the cracking as, all of a sudden, every stone wall bursts forth and molten rock begins to spill into the territory. All the walls, now, five feet of lava have filled in. Show me on the map where you last were?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where I last was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, show me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw. Don't have advantage anymore, because Haste is gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. That is a 30, I think, hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's plenty. So you dodge out of the way just in time, however, you guys watch as all the walls now, within five feet of them, are now just spilling lava and it's filling into the room. You get the sense that it's going to continue to fill with each passing round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You mean closing in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the walls are slowly closing in until the room fills with lava.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we see Vax now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not. It is now Vax's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so, Pike is in the little tunnel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell. You don't see her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm looking from my spot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Right, I don't see her. And I don't see Keyleth. Okay, so what I want to do--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How's it feel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --is use my action to do that, and use my bonus to-- Just a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Just a little? To where? Give me specifically. Sorry, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You hear in the distance this kind of hissing sound. Hand me the sheet real fast? So I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, gosh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As from around the corner, a tiny serpent appears and lashes out at you, Keyleth. Simon, a very familiar friend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Simon! Oh, hey, bud! Hey, friend, what's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rears back and strikes at you, being the poisonous snake that it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no, what's the matter, you lost? You lost, Simon? Oh, don't worry, bud, we're going to get out of this okay. Whoa, fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, that's a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It strikes at you, and you just kinda step back and go, "Aw, Simon."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She didn't lose any hit points? Oh, it's an attack roll, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so the walls are coming in. Do I see a floating weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No? I don't see the floating Sarenrae weapon or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really, the wall's too high. The walls are about ten feet up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I am going to-- Okay, I dropped my Sleet Storm. I am now going to come through and come here. Do I see Vax at all? I'm going to do another perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check as a bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Negative. A two. I've been rolling terribly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're trying, now the lava's caving in-- I'm going to just hold Blight. I'm going to hold my action and see if I see Pike or Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. All right, Pike, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blight, or Call Lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blight or Call Lightning. Which one are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm holding my attack action. It depends on how close they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Usually, you tell what spell you're preparing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I have Call Lightning up as a concentration spell, and Blight is an instant action. If I see Pike, I will Call Lightning. If I see Vax, I will Blight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, I'm going to move forward to the front of this little tunnel here, and I'm going to stay in there. And then I'm going to move my spiritual weapon so it stays with me. Or does it stay with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action, you can move it 20 feet and repeat an attack against a creature within five feet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And each square is five? Okay, I'll just keep it with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, it's starting to get close to closing off the exit of this wall. You see it now beginning to spill into this lava form there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have my Wall of Stone up here and here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. But it's still spilling out of all the walls on each side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You need to make another dexterity check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even though I stepped one in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stepped one in, away from it, and then it moved in one more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Ohh! One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Welcome to the club.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 42 points of fire damage

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the lava surges past you, you manage to just step out of the very edge, but a familiar sensation hits you as the severe pain you once held in one foot, you now feel in both. All righty! Vax, it's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to materialize. I'll have gone one, two, three, four, five to here. I'm going to throw a dagger--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moment you appear, Keyleth, you get your Blight spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, baby. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't walked up to you, but if it's ranged--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's ranged. It's a 30-foot range. As soon as you appear. No, constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's on me right now to roll? Here we go. Ugh, it's a big six. Big six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is 8d8 necrotic damage against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm gone, I'm out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Low rolls. Ten, 13--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have necrotic resistance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, still. Still going to get knocked out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 28 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 14 points of necrotic damage to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you see Vax appear, dagger in hand, rushing toward you, you turn and release the Blight spell. You see the veins of black curl up his body as his skin begins to curl and tear open in certain places and he falls facedown on the edge of this lava pool right there, one hand kind of like (sizzling), fingers beginning to catch flame as it just touches the edge of the lava.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel so guilty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Vax is down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How sadistic do I want to be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you. What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what do I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't do anything, as she kicks your unconscious form into the molten rock, and your body slowly burns away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the Death Ward does nothing against that? Death save, advantage, all of that, nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't so much about death saving throws as your unconscious body, unable to do anything, is being pushed slowly into molten rock. Vax is no more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait wait. I'll never let go. I'll never let go, Vax!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So stupid, Rose! So stupid, Rose!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the molten rock takes his arm, as it slowly disappears beneath the lava, Marisha, it turns into a middle finger, and disappears beneath the molten rock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's totally on me. I wasn't paying attention. I heard you say Blight and I should have stayed put. That was my mistake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your action, kicking his body into the lava.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was gnarly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do now? You still have a move, and a bonus if you wanted to use it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have a move and a bonus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember, the walls are caving in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know you wouldn't sink in lava. It's fantasy lava. Every time I look over to chat, there's just someone-- Ugh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, it's a game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fun. We're having a good time. She pushed him partially into it and he just burst into flames, is what really would have happened, but it's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Down to the ladies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. The physics in Exandria are different than your normal mortal realm. All right. So. You move over there, and you're done?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I move over there and still have a bonus, right? All right. I am going to Healing Word myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 1d4 plus six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to do first-level here, just to top me off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Pike, you're up after this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pike, you're up. Dude, you had a good game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Amazing. So much fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were metal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to peek out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also see there is lava lapping at your foot and you can see it moving slowly in your direction.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So how far can I move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, first off, the sleet spell you let go for Call Lightning?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So how far can I move around right here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's five, ten. You can move all the way over here if you want, it's up to you. Or over here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And is there lava over here? Okay, I'm going to move right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you move right there. All right. And you can use your bonus action to move your blade if you want to as well, 20 feet. So you're going to do that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten. Where do you want to go for the rest of it? Towards Keyleth? 15, 20. It just floats over the lava, so it's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am going to cast Harm on Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds horrible. I don't even know what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're about to find out is what you're about to find out! Oh, no. Okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While Matt flips, what I was going to do before I forgot that was stab you in the back, and then just wrench you down into the lava.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (giggling) Oh no...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, no, man. This is a good match-up, though, because--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take 14d6 necrotic damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you like some extra d6?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take my Sneak Attack dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) There you go. All of that!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of them. Roll them all at once. Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. Oh my God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Re-roll the cocked one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that changed that one. Oh well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want a fistfight at the end of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just go out to the parking lot? Take our shirts off. (rage sound)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ow, you hit me in the ear!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stop pulling my hair!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 44 points of necrotic damage. By the way, your max health is also reduced by 44.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That necrotic stuff hurts, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does that bring you to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 31 points. Right? Or 95 minus 44. I way overcompensated. 51, not 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 51 hit points. All right, so that's your Harm spell!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yikes. Okay, and then I'm going to cast-- no, that's all I can do, right? Because I did the bonus action to move the Spiritual Weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Doofus-esque voice) "Heh, heh, this is great."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh gosh, she's going to kill me. She's going to kill me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so first I want to do, just as my action, a Call Lightning right onto Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Pike, I need you to roll a dexterity saving throw. Your favorite!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The first natural 20 of the night!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll 3d10 lightning damage, halved.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 22. Halved, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of lightning damage. As the lightning hits you, charging though your body, the War Cleric in you fills up with even more rage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now I want to use my bonus action to cast Blight. Or, sorry, no, to cast Grasping Vine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'm done. I'm done for, I'm done for!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fucking love lava, by the way. If I can do it here...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) Yeah, she's in range.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, Pike, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brutal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it gets me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vine streaks out, black and charred, almost like the dead forest-type exterior. It whips around you and drags you forward 20 feet into the center of the lava. You take-- (giggling) Oh my God. This is not good for you. All right, so that's 45 points of fire damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 45. Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're now being pulled into this hard but super molten rock shell, your whole body bursts into flames as now the flaming fires of righteousness of Sarenrae are now met by the flaming fires of your flesh actually burning off. What are you at, health-wise?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm at four. I have Death Ward. Not that that's probably even going to do anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, look, this one's gloating already!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, that's the end of your turn? All right, Pike, you're up! Pike, you can move out of this, because if you stay in there at the end of your turn, you're going to take the damage again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (shouting) Fuck! Okay. So. Hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vine's still right there, ready to grab you again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I take my Spiritual Weapons and cut off the vines?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen it before, you know how it works.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vine can only pull towards it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. It's not a grapple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So if you were to move towards the vine, it wouldn't be able to pull you into the lava again, essentially.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I need to get out. Yeah, I'm going to get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which direction?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where is the lava now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vine's right there. The lava has now pooled into here. You're only really going to have this space and this space.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm done. I'm done! I can't do anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've still got high AC.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I still have a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! You haven't done anything. All you did was move. As a bonus action, you could move this over to attack her, if you wanted to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: In addition to doing something else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as a bonus action. Although it is a concentration spell, and I need you to roll against 44 points of damage. Roll a constitution check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your constitution? Oh, with your constitution? Nah. Spiritual Weapon is gone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so, shit. I've got to play this correctly. You're 51?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got anything that can put her in the pool? Your biggest damage, right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a pool party wrestling match.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sear your shame. Lock in the flavor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I do have a 3rd-level. Can I throw her ass into the lava?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to try and shove her, there is lava right behind her there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try and shove her with my-- No! I'm going to Command her to jump into the pool of lava.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can Command one word.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Swim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't help! Don't help.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. How do I word this? What's the word? Jump? Ah, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try. Let me see here. Let me look at this real fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does that penguin say? Slide?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Slide! Now slide, now slide. Now dip, baby, dip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has no effect if your command is directly harmful to it, so it wouldn't work.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I'll just shove her back into the lava that's behind her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on, let me take my earrings off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, what can I do at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be interesting. All right, so you move into here. Well, you can probably do it from here, because technically you're both adjacent at this point. Go ahead and you can make a shove as your attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know how to do that. Or I can use my Frostbrand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength (athletics) check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Strength and athletics? Okay, so 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you can roll either an athletics or an acrobatics check, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take athletics for that. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike rushes around the corner with her shield and slams into you. You get pushed back into the lava that has curled out from that side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, hot. Oh, hot hot hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see. Yeah, okay, so Keyleth takes, as part of this action, 19, 29, 35 points of fire damage from the shove.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm alive, I'm alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're alive? All right. Pike, does that end your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, there's nothing else I can do, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't used your bonus action yet, I don't think. You used your action to shove.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I can't use a 7th-level, correct? If it's a bonus action? It's a bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A 7th-level spell? You have a bonus action 7th-level spell? What the fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What spell is it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Divine Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Divine Word is a bonus action, yeah. (laughs in surprise) Okay, yeah, you can do this!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah. Because you used your action to shove. All right, Keyleth, I need you to make a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sarcastically) Oh, my strongest points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus three. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many hit points are you at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, how do you want to do this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Shut up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Choose any number of creatures you can see within "range. Each creature that can hear you must make a charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a "creature suffers an effect based on its hit points." 50 or lower, they're deafened for a minute. 40 or lower, they're deafened and blinded for ten minutes. 30 or lower, they're blinded, deafened, and stunned for an hour. 20 hit points or lower: killed instantly. Ashley, how do you want to do this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. I'm going to walk over to her, because she's down, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's in the lava right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in the lava just screaming bloody murder.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to just touch her hair, and I'm going to say (tender voice) I'm sorry, but I need to kill you. And smoosh her face into the lava! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you slam her head down, radiant, divine energy fills the space around you, and then curls dark as you push your friend face-down into the lava. You hear her screams muffled as the molten rock begins to consume her hair, burning off her head, the divine energy protecting you from the heat. As you pull back suddenly, this smoldering, smoky ruin that was once Keyleth begins to slowly melt away against the tide of lava. The pouring rock halts in place as a voice goes, "And... I "have my victor!" Suddenly, the lava right behind you tears open, and you find yourself falling, plummeting into darkness, and the plummeting turns into just falling and falling, then light begins to fill the space beneath you, and you look down as a small platform of marble approaches you. You think you're about to crash into it at full terminal velocity. Instead, your feet gingerly touch, and you come to stand there. The same strange, white-clad, jheri curl-haired gentleman walks up to you and goes, "Well played!" and high-fives you. "I'll send you on back. Your "friends are fine!" and then you see the corpses of your three friends rise up out of the marble, still as wrecked as they were from the battle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi. Sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll be together forever!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done! Congratulations! (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The monstah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The monstah! Oh, down to the nitty-gritties!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four hit points, the lava pushing in, that was crazy! I didn't realize that was a bonus action!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't realize it was a bonus action until you were like, you have a bonus action, and I looked down, and I was like, okay, well. Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Had you rolled a few points higher on that lava, she would have been dead. Or had I rolled higher on my Lightning.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With Death Ward, would that have done anything, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would have brought you back to one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I would have still had that one hit point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, when you cast that Blight on me, I had 14 hit points. Whatever number of hit points I had is what you hit me for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Oh, that sucks. You put necrotic resistance specifically because you were afraid of Blight. Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, she texted me today, going, "But I won't use that on you, I promise." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I totally did say that, didn't I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Liar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Travis just texted me and said, "I am so proud." My buddy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow. I was not expecting that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, wait, I have a question. My armor has spell resistance, which gives me advantage on saving throws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spell resistance gives you advantage on spell saving throws, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that wouldn't have helped against her thing, just now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it would've. Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I didn't have to roll to save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my God, it was a charisma saving throw! I would have had advantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again. The outcome's already happened, but.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's already happened. I rolled an 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was your charisma bonus?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus three, so 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your charisma saving throw bonus is plus three?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because I have the Ring of Protection. I gain a plus two bonus to AC and saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this is a valuable lesson in remembering what your spells can do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What my armor does, yeah. So I would have saved against that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck! A 21. I would have saved.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You would have saved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was an epic end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you also accidentally benefited from something we weren't supposed to. At some point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At some point, yeah, I'm sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It all balances out. It all comes out in the wash. That Divine, man, that's such a cool ability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, that's funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was exhilarating!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gosh, that was down to the end!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got to think up better ways to kill you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm surprised no one went into the lava until the very, very end, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had plans, but you scared everybody into the corners. The minute you vanished, it just changed everything. The minute anybody had walked in front of that, I had a ten-foot push.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like I would have lost momentum right away, if I hadn't gone into stealth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Had I saved, my next move was going to be a thunder blast, to try and push you into the lava.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would have been done-zo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It came very close!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good job!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Good game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But be aware that she still had Death Ward, so even if you did hit her with that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She would have had to come back. Back up with one hit point, and then would have done it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Done something else, yes. Either way, that was an epic end. Man, cleric victory, both Battle Royales we've had.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cleric victory! Clerics are badass in general.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, everyone out there is like, "Eh, I don't want to play a cleric."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clerics. Two rounds, now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because you can heal yourself!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That saved you! Staying off to the side and healing yourself with your bonus actions and stuff, when no one was around?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I was like I'll just build up and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, man, that's what saved you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It got so dirty at the end. So dirty and nasty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was at six hit points and I stayed at six hit points for a long time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, I was about to-- That was when my gun broke. I was about to get you to drop, and then the gun broke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you were about to drop me. I ended up dropping it myself because at this point it was turning into a Mexican standoff and I couldn't do anything, and I can't cast spells when I'm in an earth elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well done, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My time was up. Even if the Blight hadn't gotten me, without Haste, I was going to start getting seen more often, and I was low, and you guys had plenty of frigging spells left at that point. I would've been toast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just running out of options.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were down to the wire, as far as spell options.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was down to the wire, because I burned 7th-level on Firestorm, 6th-level on Sunbeam, which only did half damage on him once, so that wasn't great. I still had a 5th-level spell left, and one 4th-level. I burned through all my 3rd-levels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One day you guys will get the whole group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One day. All of Vox Machina.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it'll be an eight-hour fight!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that would be the longest fight ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can move quickly and tear your face off quickly. And having Vex over there, who does a shit-ton of damage from a distance. And Sam of course being Sam. Having all of you guys in one arena, fighting? I'm looking forward to it. It's going to be a real crazy fight when it happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He'd be another one to get me down to the wire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he's got War Caster, so he gets advantage on his concentration checks, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's tough, too, because a lot of it comes down to order, after a while. It comes down to turn order.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit, I always forget that I have advantages on charisma saving throws. Advantage on all intelligence, wisdom, and charisma saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know that your strength is artificially increased. Does that artificially increase your skill sets, too? So actually, technically, your athletics should be four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, shit, so I probably would have rolled a little higher on some of these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. You still succeeded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It all balances out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's saying "Happy Birthday, Liam and Laura!"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Happy Birthday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're all wishing you Happy Birthday!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I hear one more "Read Your Spells," people, I am going to murder somebody. No more! No more read your spells or read your sheets. There's a lot to keep track of! This is my binder. Look at all this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't have other stuff to deal with, either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's not like I have three full-time jobs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to be there, and we have a few other cool surprise guests that will be announced in the near future. Anyway, that's next Wednesday. Look for the info at the official D&D twitter. Until then, guys, have a wonderful night, rest well, and is it Thursday yet? Goodnight, guys!
